languages.text: "Не могу сказать точно, Ваша Светлость. После починки я перебирал тексты, ранее не поддававшиеся дешифровке. Этот сигнал затерялся в недрах механизма, и ему может быть как неделя, так и годы".

traits.locale_text: "Не могу сказать точно, Ваша Светлость. После починки, я перебирал тексты, для отчетности — убедиться, что в ходе ремонта из цикла дешифровки не пропало ничего важного. В результате чего я и обнаружил этот сигнал, затерянный в недрах механизма. Ему может быть неделя ровно с той же вероятностью, с которой ему могут быть годы".

languages.text: "I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."
languages.original_text: "Не могу сказать точно, Ваша Светлость. После починки я перебирал тексты, ранее не поддававшиеся дешифровке. Этот сигнал затерялся в недрах механизма, и ему может быть как неделя, так и годы".

traits.locale_text: "I cannot say for sure, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

"I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

"I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

languages.text: «No puedo decirlo con certeza, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tras la reparación, investigué textos que antes había resultado imposible descifrar. Esta señal se había perdido en las entrañas del mecanismo. Podía haber llegado hace una semana o hace años».
languages.original_text: "I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo decirlo con certeza, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tras la reparación, investigué textos que antes había resultado imposible descifrar. Esta señal se había perdido en las entrañas del mecanismo. Podía haber llegado hace una semana o hace años».

languages.text: 「ハッキリとしたことは言えない。修理が終わってから、以前は解読できなかったテキストを調べた。この信号は、機械の奥底で彷徨っていた。1週間、もしかしたら何年も前のものの可能性もある」
languages.original_text: "I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

traits.locale_text: 「ハッキリとしたことは言えない。修理が終わってから、以前は解読できなかったテキストを調べた。この信号は、機械の奥底で彷徨っていた。1週間、もしかしたら何年も前のものの可能性もある」

languages.text: “这个我恐怕确定不了，大人。修复工作结束之后，我得以浏览之前无法破译的文本。这条信息是在机器内部的储存库中发现的，可能是一个星期前发的，也可能是几年前发的。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

traits.locale_text: “这个我恐怕确定不了，大人。修复工作结束之后，我得以浏览之前无法破译的文本。这条信息是在机器内部的储存库中发现的，可能是一个星期前发的，也可能是几年前发的。”

languages.text: "Ich kann es nicht mit Gewissheit sagen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Nach den Reparaturarbeiten bin ich Texte durchgegangen, die sich zuvor nicht hatten decodieren lassen. Dieses Signal hatte sich im Inneren des Mechanismus verirrt. Es könnte eine Woche alt sein oder mehrere Jahre."
languages.original_text: "I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann es nicht mit Gewissheit sagen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Nach den Reparaturarbeiten bin ich Texte durchgegangen, die sich zuvor nicht hatten decodieren lassen. Dieses Signal hatte sich im Inneren des Mechanismus verirrt. Es könnte eine Woche alt sein oder mehrere Jahre."

languages.text: « Je n'ai aucune certitude à ce sujet, Votre Seigneurie. Une fois les réparations terminées, je me suis attelé à l'étude des textes qui avaient résisté à nos précédentes tentatives de décodage. Ce signal s'était perdu dans les entrailles du mécanisme. Il pourrait remonter à la semaine dernière comme à plusieurs années. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai aucune certitude à ce sujet, Votre Seigneurie. Une fois les réparations terminées, je me suis attelé à l'étude des textes qui avaient résisté à nos précédentes tentatives de décodage. Ce signal s'était perdu dans les entrailles du mécanisme. Il pourrait remonter à la semaine dernière comme à plusieurs années. »

languages.text: "Kesin olarak söyleyemiyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Onarımın ardından daha önceki deşifre girişimlerine direnen metinleri gözden geçirdim. Bu sinyal, mekanizmanın derinliklerinde yolunu kaybetmiş. Birkaç haftalık da birkaç yıllık da olabilir."
languages.original_text: "I cannot say with certainty, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Following the repair work, I went through texts that had defied decoding before. This signal had lost its way in the bowels of the mechanism. It could be a week old, or years."
